segments.text: I can't believe Mr . Fro didn't buy it . Who does that guy think he is anyway ? Bill Gates ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He had a lot of nerve telling us our ads sucked .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Time to order . Balista , today I want a skinny triple latte .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When did you start worrying about your weight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not . I just don't feel like drinking whole milk today . Why ? Do you think I'm fat ?
segments.speaker: S1
